Hostels in Mexico
From bustling Mexico City to the famous beaches of Acapulco and Cancun, you'll find a great selection of cheap hostels to choose from throughout Mexico.
The number of Mexican hostels has increased substantially in recent years. Hostels are now an incredibly popular form of budget accommodation in Mexico, especially with European travellers.
Hostels.com currently works with approximately 95 properties across Mexico.
